verbs.description: [ARG0: rockets] [V: missing] [ARG1: too many layups wide - open shots] [ARGM-TMP: when mike d’antoni followed losses to the jazz and clippers] with declarations that the rockets would solve their early - season issues and become the team they expected to be the coach message was not designed for fans critics or anyone else beyond his locker room the prediction had already been delivered to members of his team because among the problems to correct has been the way the rockets have reacted to their struggles even on the offensive end where they are certain to excel asked how much the message was with his players in mind d’antoni said all of it it for everybody nba mike d’antoni rockets layups eric gordon
